Talent Solutions Consultant - Medical and Science

We serve medical and science professionals seeking life-changing career opportunities as well as clients in these fields needing to solve skill gaps. We think and act on a global scale, providing clients with access to qualified staff from within and beyond their own markets. And to meet that need, we recruit and train professionals that are motivated to use and develop their skills in a different environment. Our international mobility managers working around the world are a team of medical and science experts with knowledge of a broad range of specialties. An Adecco Medical and Science mobility manager not only looks after our database of candidates and opportunities. They are trained to bring expertise to the challenge of international mobility in a fast- changing, technical and caring area of work.From the professional requirements for fidelity, certification and training programmes to helping with visa or accommodation needs – they ease the path to mobility. More than 30,000 medical and science professionals and 15,000 organizations – from major hospitals to small biotech companies – choose to work with Adecco every year. Adecco Medical and Science is part of the Adecco Group, the world’s leading provider of HR solutions. Adecco’s medical and science team operate variously under the Adecco, Time and More (Germany) and Roevin Scientific (UK) brands.
Certified Personal Development Coach and NLP Practitioner

Sprockets Group specializes in Recovery, Addiction, PTSD, and Personal Coaching.  Our unique approach to wellness includes, Mindfulness, Cycling, Meditation, Love, Yoga and the 12 Steps as change agents.  We want to help you Unleash your Power and heal from within.  We draw our strength and experience from over 32 years of recovery in a well know 12 step program and many more years working directly with Addicts and Trauma Victims.  We have the tools and proven track record to help you put your life back together or in many cases, put your life together for the very first time.

National Search Associates provides executive search and recruitment services for the Pharmaceutical & Biotechnology, Medical Device, and Diagnostics industries. Our highly experienced recruiters focus on your specific search needs in order to provide you with outstanding service. For candidates and clients alike, National Search Associates is constantly in search of excellence.Contingency and Retained Search of Clinical Operations professionals such as Clinical Operations Directors, Trial Managers, Project Team Leaders, Project Managers, etc., at all levels including Sr. Director and Vice President.  I also work with all things Clinical data, including Biostatisticians, SAS Programmers, Clinical Data Managers, Clinical Data Base Administrators, Clinical System Analysts, Clinical Programmers, and Software Engineers.
Global Conductor is a management consulting firm that supports Fortune 500 firms with the implementation and integration of large scale, complex projects.

June 9, 2012, Frank was a client of Randy’s

Randy was instrumental in coordinating my job effort and move from Massachusetts to San Diego.  He understood quickly what my strengths were and what companies were best suited for my talents.  In a matter of three months, I was phone interviewed,  had an on site interview, and then offered a position with my present company.  I could not be happier with the seamless effort Randy made the whole experience appear.  Not only did Randy provide the job opportunity, but he also assisted in my move to San Diego by recommending certain areas for housing based on my desire to be within a certain radius to the employer's facility.If I need to pursue job opportunities in the future, Randy will be the first and only contact for providing valuable assistance in my search.

summary: I have been fortunate to have a career that has led me in many different directions and exposed me to a multitude of extremely talented individuals.   I have held Director and VP roles for companies in industries as diverse as Pharmaceutical, Health Care, Staffing, Industrial Packaging, Telecom/Internet, Computer, Construction, and Software. In addition, I served in city government as a Planning Commissioner, was the Founder and Race Director of a World Class Bicycle Race, and most recently I founded a non-profit to serve the homeless in San Diego, Not On Our Watch - San Diego.  As an Entrepreneur, Athlete, Author, Coach, Community and Social Activist, I have over 30 years of running and launching successful businesses, mentoring, building high performance teams, and helping individuals achieve their personal and professional goals.  During my journey through life, love, business and recovery, I have discovered over and over again that my true value is serving others.  As a Connector, I am able to serve my life purpose and be of service to all.  Please allow me to help you Unleash Your Power!Due to my in-depth knowledge and understanding of the vital and diverse communities that I serve, and a passion and love for all humanity, I am able to proactively tackle the unique challenges of my clients Locally, Regionally, Nationally, and beyond.Sending Peace, Light, Love, and Healing Energy to wherever you are in your personal transformation.Specialties:  Pharmaceutical, Bio Medical, Biotech, Chemist, QC, Formulations, Clinical Operations, Study, CRA, CTM, Analyst, Microbiologist, Executive Coach, Life Coach, Recovery Coach, Career Coach, Business Coach, Personal Coach, Recovery Coach, Addiction Coach,  Group Coach, Author, Motivational Speaker, Accountability Partner, Art, Sculpture, Design, Commission, Metal Work, Cycling, Triathlon, Fortune 100, Fortune 500, Director, Consulting, C Level, Certified Life Coach, Certified NLP Practitioner
